## ACartesian2dUserTransform class

Provides a user transform that assumes maxes and mins will remain extrema.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class ACartesian2dUserTransform implements ICartesian2dUserTransform 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ICartesian2dUserTransform](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dusertransform.md)
